name: Play
description:
Indonesian is under attack! Defend your nation against hordes of skeletons warrior, ice man, evil magma, and crazy astronout; armed with four heroes from your own!

Fight on forests, beach, and wastelands. Upgrade your towers with more powerful, more speed, more range, and defeat your enemies, summon additional bullet to aim all enemies with 50 gold in, summon additional effect to make enemies slow, or buy heart to add your lives in game.

Build towers to attack incoming enemies and stop them from getting past your defenses. Earn gold by defeating enemies and use it to build more towers.
